known_issues: Version 14 broke functionality that was working in version 13

existing_features.title: Validate that all wizard forms (OrderWizard, RepairWizard, PiercingWizard, OtherWizard) complete their workflows without errors

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore all functionality that was working in version 13 but is now broken in version 14
Preserve the version 14 feature that disables 'Added Material Weight' and 'Material Cost' fields when 'Other' material is selected in the repair order form
Verify that order placement, update, and retrieval functions work correctly for all order types (orders, repair orders, piercing services, other services)
Ensure dashboard statistics and recent records display correctly for all service types
